meanings.definition: A form of visual art consisting of images and text, often in a sequential format, to tell a story or convey information.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading comics with colorful pictures and speech bubbles.
meanings.sent2: The library has a large collection of comics for kids to read.
meanings.sent3: The comics in the newspaper always make me smile with their funny characters.
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a series of comics, each day a new panel in the story.
meanings.sent5: The artist's comics were so detailed, it felt like stepping into a different world.

meanings.definition: Jokes or humorous stories, especially when told in a comic strip or stand-up routine.
meanings.sent1: Dad always tells the best comics during family dinners to make us laugh.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's comics had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent3: The comics at the comedy club had everyone giggling uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Life's little mishaps can sometimes turn into the best comics for later retelling.
meanings.sent5: Her friend's funny antics were like living in a real-life comics strip.
